scripts.clean: npm run clean:lib && npm run clean:examples
scripts.babel: npm run babel:lib && npm run babel:examples
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run browserify
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar 'index.js' './examples/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' './examples/es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build'
scripts.babel-debug: npm run babel:lib-debug && npm run babel:examples-debug
scripts.build-debug: npm run clean && npm run babel-debug && npm run browserify-debug
scripts.watch-debug: npm run build-debug && chokidar 'index.js' './examples/index.js' './es6/**/*.js' './examples/es6/**/*.js' -c 'npm run build-debug'
